title: Expand columns with values and nested tables in Power Query
excerpt: Have you tried to expand tables on columns that have both values and nested tables but the double arrow is missing? Here is how to do it when that happens :)  Join this channel membership to get access to all the recorded bites as they become available: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw/join
